00001 def random(pop, genomes, random_mod, to_replace):
00002     popsize = len(pop) - 1
00003     genome_len = len(genomes)
00004 
00005     for i in xrange(to_replace):
00006         rand_index = random_mod.randint(0, popsize)
00007         pop[rand_index] = genomes[i%genome_len]
